types.description: Send list of all network services attached to board.

out_ports.description: Name of network services supported by system.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Connect or disconnect to one available network access point.

in_ports.description: Trigger to connect to network service.
in_ports.name: CONNECT

in_ports.description: Trigger to disconnect to network service.
in_ports.name: DISCONNECT

types.name: netctl/service

members.description: Refer to netctl/list-services on how to get the service name
members.name: name

in_ports.description: Trigger to emit an output packet with current state
in_ports.name: TRIGGER

out_ports.description: The string with the current state, such as unknown, idle, association, configuration, ready, online, disconnect, remove
out_ports.name: OUT

out_ports.description: Emits true if the device has a verified connection to the internet, false otherwise.
out_ports.name: ONLINE

types.description: Sets the global connection state to offline

in_ports.description: turn on or off the radios
in_ports.name: ENABLED

out_ports.description: the actual state of the radios. If true, radios are online
